Title: microsoft-open-hack-app-modernization-with-nosql
Description: OpenHack Challenges for App Modernization with NoSQL

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 3: Optimize
ContentItems.Description: Find and use optimal partitioning key to optimize database

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 4: Event Sourcing
ContentItems.Description: Create process to consume and ingest data into database

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 5: Search
ContentItems.Description: Apply search functionality to the database

ContentItems.Title: Challenge 6: Take Over the World
ContentItems.Description: Expand data storage across regions to scale the database
